channel.title: Gelman Library New Books Shelf (all call numbers A-Z)
channel.description: This RSS feed lists books currently on the Gelman Library's new-books shelf that have a call number beginning with A_through_Z . This list is updated roughly every Friday. Last updated on Thu Oct 27 15:20:51 EDT 2011
